item.description:
Since I have been asked by many members, I have decided to finally schedule a Reiki I Certification class. Upon completion we can start to hold regular Reiki Share sessions for graduates to practice. The study of Reiki can greatly compliment the other classes this group sponsors.

Reiki Level I students become acquainted with Reiki energy and are taught how to perform healing sessions on the self and others. Learning Reiki involves an energy activation process called an “attunement” which is performed by the Reiki Master with each student. Through this process students are opened to the flow of Reiki energy which provides an energetic shift, causing healing energies and intuitive insights to emerge. The attunement opens innate healing channels, enabling students to immediately tap into the flow of Reiki energy and perform healing sessions. In addition to learning the Reiki method of healing, students also may experience an increase in their spiritual awareness and intuitive abilities. After learning Reiki, students report having increased energy, self-awareness, personal charisma, peace, and compassion.

Topics covered in Reiki I Certification:

  • What is Reiki and how the Reiki energy works
  • The history of Reiki
  • How to channel Reiki energy for self-healing and the healing of others
  • Reiki Level I Attunement which open the flow of Reiki energy within the student
  • Hand positions for healing
  • Techniques for expanding intuitive, extra-sensory perceptions
  • How the chakras function with regard to healing work and everyday life
  • Self-healing techniques for expanding personal awareness and accelerating wellness
  • Hands-on practice both giving and receiving Reiki sessions
  • Reiki and spiritual growth

Class Duration: 2 afternoon sessions
Reiki Level I includes a Reiki Level I Manual and certification through the American Reiki Academy as a Reiki Practitioner. Initiation into the Level II energies is given privately one-on-one with the Reiki Master. Students are empowered to use Reiki on themselves and others directly following this class, with ongoing support available. The regular price for this class is $125 but due to the nature of this group I am providing training at half my regular rate.

Classes run 2 days, Saturday 10 AM- 4 PM and Sunday 12 noon -6 PM
Bring a lunch and wear comfortable clothing

Cost is $75 and includes all materials, $50 non-refundable deposit due to reserve space; balance due in full prior to start of class.
